thread.title: Jimmy Kimmel's NFL Mean Tweets Continue With Russell Wilson, Tony Romo and More
thread.title_full: Jimmy Kimmel's NFL Mean Tweets Continue With Russell Wilson, Tony Romo and More

title: Jimmy Kimmel's NFL Mean Tweets Continue With Russell Wilson, Tony Romo and More
text:
Jimmy Kimmel's NFL Mean Tweets Continue With Russell Wilson, Tony Romo and More February 3, 2017 @ 8:25 AM By Stephanie Webber 
Bruising egos! Russell Wilson , Tony Romo and J.J. Watt were just some footballers that had to endure rude comments in part two of Jimmy Kimmel's Mean Tweets NFL edition. Watch the video above! 
The Jimmy   released the new hilarious clip during his late-night show   2. Some players laughed off the teasing while others hit back. Hollywood's Hottest Football Fans! 
Wilson, 28, for his part, shrugged and went silent. "I'm tired of people saying Russell Wilson is too short to play quarterback," he read. "He's ugly, too." 
Watt, 27, meanwhile, was compared to a fellow celebrity. "JJ Watt kinda looks like a fat @macklemore hahaha," one commenter wrote about the Houston Texans defensive end. 
Most tweets were filled with expletives and random scenarios. "Tony Romo sits down to pee," another person tweeted. Romo, 36, replied: "Well, what other way is there to pee?" You May Also Like
